title: Dengue Breakout: AAP directs hospitals to form fever clinics and urges not to panic
content:
Source: News unlimited - 1 day ago 
AAP directs hospitals not to deny admissions for dengue patients  02:01 New Delhi, Sep 14 (ANI): Delhi Health Minister Satyendra Kumar Jain said on Sunday that the Delhi government has directed hospitals not to deny admissions for dengue patients. Although he further added that people should not be admitted on the grounds of ‘panic’ but the doctors should use...
